query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Beat It', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and popular culture?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal prowess and her iconic hits, like 'I Will Always Love You', impact the landscape of contemporary pop and R&B music?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to reinvent his musical style and persona throughout his career influence the development of glam rock and the broader music genre?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's theatrical performances and songwriting in Queen's hits, such as 'Bohemian Rhapsody', redefine live music experiences and rock music as a whole?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's blending of pop and R&B influences in her music, along with her vocal techniques, shaped the sound and direction of modern pop music?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's music and message of peace and social justice contribute to the global popularity of reggae and the cultural movements of his time?
